application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

titleStmt.title: Interpreting Racial Identities and Resistance to Segregation in the Digital Sphere

analytic.title: Interpreting Racial Identities and Resistance to Segregation in the Digital Sphere

div.head: Algeo, K., Epperson, A. and Blunt, M. (2011). "Historical GIS as a platform for public memory at Mammoth Cave National Park." International Journal of Applied Geospatial Research, 2(4): 19-37. Devore, D. E. and Logsdon, J. (1991). Crescent City Schools:
div.p: Public Education in New Orleans, 1841-1991. Lafayette: Center for Louisiana Studies, University of Southwestern Louisiana.
